Methods

<static> MustacheMail(argMailOptions, argModel)

Replaces all Mustache {{val}} placeholder values with values from the model object.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
argMailOptions object Mail object that contains fields such as from:, to:, subject:, html:.
argModel object Data to fill in the mail option placeholders.
